name: Maze Game (itch) (linsy)
description:
MAZE GAME

Where you simply have to move through each of the levels and make it to the green finish line, except each level is more challenging than the last. All that is needed to play is your mouse! steadily hover your mouse within the maze until you reach the end and complete all levels. Before each level, make sure you place your mouse on top of the cursor before continuing. Maze Game is my first class game assignment created in Processing and was made for funsies!
